Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Admiral in Sorrento, you'll be minutes from Marina Grande and close to Piazza Tasso. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Wooden Marquetry Workshop-Museum and Dali Universe.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 62 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature bidets and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a rooftop terrace. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Admiral in Sorrento, you'll be minutes from Marina Grande and close to Piazza Tasso. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Wooden Marquetry Workshop-Museum and Dali Universe.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Marina Grande - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Wooden Marquetry Workshop-Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Dali Universe - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Wonderwall Art Gallery - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Museo Bottega della Tarsia Lignea - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Villa Comunale Park - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Chiesa di San Francesco - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Marcello Aversa Workshop - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Sorrento Foundation - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Sorrento Cathedral - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Basilica di Sant'Antonio - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Piazza Sant'Antonino - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Tasso Theatre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Port of Sorrento - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Sedile Dominova - 1 km / 0.6 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Admiral is Naples (NAP-Naples Intl.) - 28.6 km / 17.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Admiral is Naples (NAP-Naples Intl.) - 28.8 km / 17.9 mi.
